同时§Y黑羊王朝§! 已经接管了帖木儿时原属帝国西部的许多土地，在伊拉克南部，千禧年主义者§Y穆沙萨§!征服了胡齐斯坦，并驱逐了该地区的帖木儿官员。 §Y乌兹别克人§!也在不断掠夺我们在河中地区的财富，而我们派驻印度的官员已经从德里被逐出。

[GetYear]年即将过去，帝国的命运仍有诸多未知的变术。 如果沙哈鲁能康复过来，他或许还能再统治数年，但紧张的气氛己显而易见，每一位儿孙一生都在等待着这位帝王死去的那一刻……

original:
[Root.Monarch.GetName] rules §Y[Root.GetName]§! from Astarabad as a governor of the §YTimurid§! ruler §YShah Rukh§!. Our ruler is Shah Rukh's grandson, and a claimant to the great Timurid Empire that once stretched from §YAnatolia§! to §YDelhi§!.

Shah Rukh is old, however, and his once firm grip over every affair in the empire is a thing of the past.

In §YAjam§! his grandson, and our ruler's brother, Muhammad bin Baysonqor, is independent, in all but name. In §YTransoxiana§! their uncle, Ulugh Beg, has built a strong power base for himself.
Though §YFars§! is ruled by the child prince Abdallah bin Ibrahim, his claim is just as true as that of his cousins.

Meanwhile the §YQara Qoyunlu§! Federation has taken over Iraq and many of the western parts of Timur's original empire and in southern Iraq the millenarian §YMushasha§! have conquered Khuzestan and ousted the Timurid administrators from the region.

As [GetYear] draws to an end the fate of the empire seems uncertain. Should Shah Rukh recover he may well rule for a number of years yet, but the tension is tangible, every son and grandson has been waiting for the moment of the emperor's death their entire lives…
translation:
[Root.Monarch.GetName]统治着§Y[Root.GetName]§!，国君本人来自阿斯塔拉巴德，同时是 §Y帖木儿§!的统治者§Y沙哈鲁§!的行政官。我们的统治者沙哈鲁的孙子，对这个一度从§Y安纳托利亚§!到§Y德里§!的帖木儿帝国有着宣称权。

然而沙哈鲁已进入老迈之年，他一度把帝国内部大小事情紧抓手里进行处理时的盛况已一去不复返。

在§Y阿贾姆§!，他的孙子，同时也是我们统治者的兄弟，穆罕默德·本·拜宋豁儿，已经独立，尽管名义上还是帝国的一部分. 在§Y河中地区§!他们的伯父，乌鲁伯格，已经为自己建立了一个强大的权力基础.
尽管 §Y法尔斯§!由尚是孩童的阿卜杜拉·本·易卜拉欣统治，但他的宣称权和他的堂兄弟一样正当合法。

同时§Y黑羊王朝§!已经接管了帖木儿原来的帝国西部的许多土地，以及在伊拉克南部千禧年主义的§Y穆纱萨§!征服了胡齐斯坦，并驱逐了该地区的帖木儿行政官员。

[GetYear]年即将过去，帝国的命运还是不确定的。 如果沙鲁克康复过来，他或许还能再统治数年，但事情已经明了，每一位儿孙都在等待着这位帝王死去的那一刻，届时，他们整个生活将……

original:
§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! rules §Y[Root.GetName]§! from Samarkand, the great capital of his grandfather Timur, the conqueror who built an empire from §YAnatolia§! to §YDelhi§!. Our overlord and [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s father §YShah Rukh§! rules his father's empire from Herat to our south, as the supreme authority over Transoxiana and all other Timurid realms.

Shah Rukh's reign is near its end, however, and the aging ruler has fallen ill during the past year. In the provinces his sons and grandsons are observing the court in Herat with great interest. §YAjam§! under Muhammad bin Baysonqor is already independent in all but name. In Astarabad, §YKhorasan§!, his brother Babur has built a small power base for himself, no doubt with the only goal to have a base in the coming succession struggles.

§YAfghanistan§! is ruled by a lesser grandson while §YFars§! is in the hands of a 12 year old prince of the dynasty.

Meanwhile the §YUzbeks§! to the north are watching with interest, awaiting the day we will be weakened by the inevitable succession struggle. In the west other enemies of the Empire, such as the §YQara Qoyunlu§! and the millenarian §YMushasha§!, have made great inroads into what was once Timur's domain.

As [GetYear] draws to an end the fate of the empire seems uncertain. Should Shah Rukh recover he may well rule for a number of years yet, but the tension is tangible, every son and grandson has been waiting for the moment of the emperor's death their entire lives…
translation:
在他的祖父，建立了从 §Y安纳托利亚§!到§Y德里§!的庞大帝国的征服者帖木儿的首都撒马尔罕，§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!统治着§Y[Root.GetName]§!。我们的宗主，[Root.Monarch.GetName]的父亲§Y沙哈鲁§!，作为河中地区和其他帖木儿汗国领地的最高统治者，领导着他父亲建立的从哈烈到我们南方的帝国。

但沙哈鲁的统治即将走到尽头。年老的统治者在过去几年里一直卧床不起，而他的儿孙们正在外地对哈烈的宫廷虎视眈眈。在§Y阿贾姆§!，穆罕默德-本-拜宋豁儿的政权除了在名义上之外已经独立。在§Y呼罗珊§!的阿斯塔拉巴德，他的兄弟巴八儿也建立了自己的小权力中心，无疑是为了继承权的争夺打下基础。

§Y阿富汗§!被他更年幼的孙子控制，而§Y法尔斯§!则被王朝12岁的小王子掌控。

同时，北方的 §Y乌兹别克§!也在虎视眈眈，等待着我们被不可避免的继承权争斗削弱的那一天。在西方，帝国的其他敌人，比如§Y黑羊§!和千禧年主义的§Y穆沙萨§!，正在大规模侵扰曾经属于帖木儿帝国的领土。

随着[GetYear]即将结束，帝国前途未卜。如果沙哈鲁得以康复，他还能在几年内继续他的统治，但局势已然紧张，每一个子孙都在静待他们已经期待一生的皇帝殡天一刻……

original: [GetYear] is a time of transition in North Africa. South of the Sahara, the old §YMali§! Empire is long past its prime, and by now most areas except the core of the state has slipped into independence or into the hands of the rising §YSonghai§! and §YMossi§! kingdoms.\n\nNorth of the Sahara, the Maghreb countries are suffering from shrinking cities, loss of authority, and political instability, after a long period of tribal Arab migration into the area. The §YHafsid§! and §YMarinid§! empires in §YTunis§! and §YFez§! are respectively still powers to be counted with, but in the mountains and deserts, a number of regional kings and chiefs wait for a moment of weakness.
translation: 在北非，[GetYear]是一段变革的时期。 撒哈拉以南，古老的 §Y马里§!帝国已经度过它的巅峰期很久了。现在除了帝国核心的直属州，绝大部分的其他地区不是分裂独立就是落入了正在崛起的 §Y桑海§! 和§Y莫西§!王国之手。\n\n撒哈拉以北，马格利布地区的国家在阿拉伯部落大迁徙后，纷纷遭受着城市萎缩， 权威丧失以及政治动荡。 §Y哈夫斯§!和§Y马利尼德§!帝国在§Y突尼斯§! 和§Y非斯§!虽仍然被视为强大的势力。但在沙漠和山区，许多地域的部落首领和国王正等候着帝国衰落的时机。

original: §YEthiopia§!, under the §YSolominid§! king §YZara Yakob§!, is experiencing a golden age of expansion and inner strength. In many ways this dynamic Empire is dominating the entire region. However, the many Muslim and Pagan states of the Horn of Africa, all view this expansion of a militant Christian Empire with fear and contempt.\n\nFurther down the Nile, the last remnants of the Christian Nubian Kingdoms are fighting for their survival against §YMamluks§! in the north, as well as the local Muslim tribal federations that have moved into the area.
translation: §Y埃塞俄比亚§!在§Y所罗门§!王朝的§Y扎拉·雅各布§!的引领下，正度过着一段国力提升与对外扩张的黄金时期。在许多方面，这个充满活力的帝国正统治着整个区域。然而，非洲之角的许多穆斯林和多神教国家，都充满恐惧与蔑视地将这种行为视作这个基督教帝国的侵略。\n\n在尼罗河的下游，努比亚人仅存的基督教王国正为了生存与§Y马穆鲁克§!以及当地的穆斯林部落联盟在北部浴血奋战。

original: In [GetYear] conflict is brewing on the §YMing§!-§YOirat§! border. §YEsen Choros§!, leader of the §YOirats§!, has united a great area. As the Chinese look on with concern, he is now raising an army from the steppes.\n\nTo the east, §YKorea§! prospers under the leadership of the now quite old king §YSejong§! and in §YJapan§!, the authority of the Shogunate has slowly begun to erode, in the wake of the assassination of Shogun Ashikaga Yoshinori.
translation: 在[GetYear]年一场冲突在§Y大明§!与§Y瓦剌§!的边界上悄然酝酿。作为§Y瓦剌§!的领袖，§Y绰罗斯·也先§!已经统一了大片区域。中国人正忧虑的关注着他在草原上日益增强的军队。\n\n在更东方，§Y朝鲜§!在年过不惑的国王§Y世宗§!的领导下享受着繁荣。与此同时在§Y日本§!，随着将军足利义教被暗杀，幕府的权威开始缓慢的衰败。

original:
The 15th century was a time of turbulence in Indochina and Indonesia, which saw many new dynasties rise, while others faded. Ever since §YMing§! reverted to a more passive foreign policy in 1430's, §YMalacca§! has dominated the sea trade, competing with §YPasai§! in Sumatra, §YBrunei§! in Borneo (Kalimantan), and §YMajapahit§! in Java.

In northern and central Indochina, §YDai Viet§!, §YAyutthaya§!, and §YLan Xang§! are competing with the old kingdoms of §YChampa§! and §YKhmer§!.
The Burmese city state of §YTaungu§!, soon to become the most aggressive Empire in this region, was in [GetYear] still a small state dependent on §YAva§!.
translation:
在印度支那与印度尼西亚，15世纪是一个动荡的时期，一些新兴的王朝崛起，而一些则衰落。自从§Y大明§!在1430年代恢复了更加消极的对外政策，§Y马六甲§!就主导了整个海上贸易，与§Y八昔§!在苏门答腊，和§Y文莱§!在婆罗洲（加里曼丹），同§Y满者伯夷§!在爪哇均进行着竞争。

在印度支那的北部和中部，§Y大越§!、§Y阿瑜陀耶§!和§Y琅勃拉邦§!正与古老的王国§Y占婆§!和§Y高棉§!进行着对抗。
缅甸的§Y东吁§!，在 [GetYear] 年虽然仍是一个依附于§Y阿瓦§!的小城邦，却很快会成为该地区最有侵略性的的一个帝国。

original:
As the §YTimurid§! Empire's borders recede, a number of regional magnates and tribal chiefs see their opportunity to carve out states for themselves.
In Anatolia and Syria this vacuum has already been filled by the §YOttomans§! and §YMamluks§!, the old regional powers in this area.

In this uncertain political situation, tensions are on the rise between the old sedentary cultures of the region and the many Turkic tribes that dominate its military and political life. Many of the Turkoman Tribesmen have started to turn to millenarian sects such as the Safawiya – a development that might well reshape the future of the region completely.
translation:
随着§Y帖木儿§!帝国疆域的收缩，各个地域的权贵与首领看到了他们独立建国的机会。
在安纳托利亚与叙利亚，统治的真空被该区域已有的强权§Y奥斯曼§!和§Y马穆鲁克§!所填充。

在这种政治不定的情况下，古老的农耕文明与统治该地军事政治的突厥部族的矛盾愈发剧烈。 很多土库曼的部族转而皈依了千禧年主义教派比如萨非教团， 这一发展或许会彻底改变该区域的未来。

original: Oblivious to the threat from the steppes, the princes of Samarkand tear Timur's empire apart in their attempts to secure land and power for themselves. To their north, the Shaybanids have been uniting the Kazak and §YUzbek§! tribes, and are now preparing to invade §YTransoxiana§! and take Samarkand for themselves.
translation: 撒马尔罕的首领们为了试图获得土地和权力而肢解了帖木儿帝国 ，而忽视了大草原上的威胁。 在他们的北方，昔班尼王朝已经统一了哈萨克和 §Y乌兹别克§!各部落，现在正准备入侵§Y河中§!，以占据撒马尔罕。

original: In the period between §YTimur§!'s sack of §YDelhi§! in 1398, and the eventual §YMughal§! hegemony in the north, a number of strong and diverse regional kingdoms arose in India.\nSouthern India is locked in conflict between the §YBahmani§! Sultanate, the §YGajapati§! state in §YOrissa§!, and the §YVijayanagara§! Empire. In the north, the last of the Sayyid Sultans of Delhi is desperately trying to cling on to his throne, as a local magnate named §YBahlul Lodi§! marches on the capital. Meanwhile the former Delhian governors in §YJaunpur§!, §YGujarat§!, §YMalwa§!, and §YBengal§! fight each other and other local dynasties over the remains of the Delhian empire.
translation: 从§Y帖木儿§!于1398年洗劫 §Y德里§!到§Y莫卧儿§!最终在北部建立霸权，大量形形色色的地区强国在这一时期在印度崛起。\n印度的南部陷入了§Y巴赫曼尼§!苏丹国、§Y奥里萨§!的§Y加贾帕蒂§!王朝以及 §Y毗奢耶那伽罗§!帝国的纷争中。在北方，地方大贵族§Y巴赫鲁勒·洛迪§!向首都进军时，德里最后的赛义德苏丹正绝望地试图稳固住他的王座。与此同时，前德里的统治者们也在 §Y章普尔§!、§Y古吉拉特§!、§Y马尔瓦§!以及§Y孟加拉§! 相互争斗，许多的王朝在德里帝国的遗迹上更迭。

original:
Europe in [GetYear] is on the verge of the §YAge of Discovery§!, yet it is reeling from the shock of the failed Crusade of Varna, as well as the threat of the §YOttoman§! Empire in the east.

The Treaty of Tours has left Western Europe with an uneasy truce, one that looks like it could break at any time, due to the ambition of the Kings of §YFrance§!, §YEngland§!, or the Duke of §YBurgundy§!.

In the north, the Kalmar Union remains in place, despite the deposition of its Pommeranian king by the Hanseatic League, as well as dissident §YSwedish§! and §YDanish§! nobles.

The §YRussian§! states are barely starting to feel free of the Tatar yoke, as the §YGolden Horde§! continues to fracture, ever since its crushing defeat at the hands of Timur.

As the High Renaissance approaches, §YItaly§! and §YGermany§! remain fraught by the constant friction between the §YEmperor§! and the many autonomous princes.

The entire continent is on the verge of major changes, and it will be up to you to lead the §Y[Root.GetAdjective]§! [Root.GovernmentName] through this period.
translation:
[GetYear]年的欧洲迎来了§Y地理大发现时代§!的曙光，虽然它刚刚经历了瓦尔纳十字军东征失败的阵痛，还面临着§Y奥斯曼§!帝国在东方的威胁。

图尔条约仅仅为西欧带来了短暂的休战，一纸停战协议远不能限制§Y法兰西§!国王、§Y英格兰§!国王和§Y勃艮第§!公爵的野心，战争随时可能再次爆发。

在北方，卡尔马联合看似稳定，但来自波美拉尼亚的国王已被汉萨同盟罢黜，§Y瑞典§!和§Y丹麦§!的贵族们也存在着矛盾。

自从§Y金帐汗国§!惨败于帖木儿的铁蹄下，整个国家便开始分裂，而§Y罗斯§!各国终于得以艰难地摆脱鞑靼人的奴役。

随着文艺复兴鼎盛时期的到来，§Y意大利§!和§Y德意志§!地区却饱受其各个自治诸侯与§Y神圣罗马帝国皇帝§!的冲突之苦。

整个大陆都陷入了前所未有的变革时代，而这一切将由你§Y[Root.GetAdjective]§![Root.GovernmentName]来引领。

original:
Asia is a huge continent, and in [GetYear] it is inhabited by a number of diverse peoples.

In the west, the §YOttomans§! are on the rise while the §YTimurids§! are crumbling, leaving room to a number of new promising states and would-be empires from Azerbaijan to Central Asia and India.

In the far East, the §YMing§!, still a young dynasty by Chinese standards, are consolidating their hold over the Empire of China and its Southeast Asian tributaries, while also trying to contain the nomads of the north.

The island of §YJapan§! is rife with conflict, as a number of weakening Shoguns have left the country open to self-made Daimyo, local strong men from smaller clans.
translation:
亚洲是个辽阔的大陆，在[GetYear]年形形色色的民族分布其上。

在西方，随着§Y帖木儿§!帝国的崩塌，§Y奥斯曼§!开始崛起。同时从阿塞拜疆到中亚和印度，许多新兴的国家和未来的帝国也开始在其残骸上成长。

而在东方，从中国的历史的角度来看§Y明朝§!仍然是一个年轻的王朝，正稳固着来自东南各国的朝贡，同时也试图遏制住来自北方游牧的威胁。

§Y日本§!正面饱受着纷争与战乱，几代幕府将军的软弱使得来自各地的强权自称大名且各自为政。

original: The African continent is huge and diverse. West Africa is home to a number of rising kingdoms, such as §YSonghai§! or §YBornu§!, as well as waning states, such as the §YMali§! Empire. The Maghreb is going through a general crisis of de-urbanization, foreign invasions, and famine, while Egypt is firmly under the rule of the §YMamluk§! households. In the east, §YEthiopia§! is dominating the Horn of Africa, and maritime Sultanate of §YKilwa§! is desperately trying to control the Swahili sultanates on the coast.\nBy the Great Lakes, the Intralacustrine kingdoms fight over the spoils of the Kitara Empire, while the §YMutapa§! and §YMarawi§! kingdoms try to assert their authority over the Zambezi.
translation: 非洲大陆庞大且纷繁复杂。西非是很多新兴王国的发祥地，比如§Y桑海§!或§Y博尔努§!。当然也包含了一些渐渐衰亡的国家，§Y马里§!帝国就是其中之一。马格里布地区正遭受着城市消亡，外敌入侵和严重的饥荒。与此同时埃及正被§Y马穆鲁克§!的王室牢牢的控制着。在东方，§Y埃塞俄比亚§!正在统治着非洲之角，海上的§Y基尔瓦§!苏丹国正在倾全国之力地试图控制海岸边斯瓦希里人的各苏丹国。\n在大湖区，湖边的各个王国都在争夺着基塔拉帝国的遗产，而§Y穆塔帕§!和§Y马拉维§!则试图坚持它们在赞比西河的权威。

original: In many parts of the world [GetYear] is a crucial year. In Europe, the shockwaves from Varna is changing the political landscape. In Asia, §YMing§! is consolidating their rule, and the many States of India are trying to gain an upper hand after Timur left the subcontinent. In the Americas, the §YAztec§! and §YIncan§! Empires have begun to form.\n\nIn Oceania, however, we know very little about what is going on. It will be up to you to make the region relevant to the rest of the world – most likely you will have to do so with sword in hand.
translation: [GetYear]年对于世界各地都是一个重要的时间点。在欧洲，瓦尔纳十字军的失败像海啸一般冲击了整个欧洲的政治格局。在亚洲，§Y大明§!正加强着王朝的统治。在印度，各个国家在帖木儿撤走后都试图在次大陆占得先机。在美洲，§Y阿兹特克§!与§Y印加§!帝国初步形成。\n\n而大洋洲对于我们来说还是一片未知之地。这一切的一切将由你来决定。请用剑与铁蹄来决定整个地区乃至整个世界吧！

original: Recent years have seen the rise of the §YAztec§! triple alliance in the valley of Mexico, while the §YTarascan§! empire has similarly started to expand their domain in the west. Further east, the Yucatan peninsula is home to the fractured remains of the Mayan Empire and the recently collapsed League of Mayapan.
translation: 近些年§Y阿兹特克§!三国同盟在墨西哥谷中崛起，而§Y塔拉斯卡§!帝国则也同样在西部崛起。更东边的尤卡坦半岛，则是玛雅文明的遗迹和最近破碎的玛雅潘联盟的家园。

original: The last remnants of the ancient Mississippian civilization are dwindling, leaving behind remnant-states that will become the §YCreeks§!, §YChickasaw§! and §YChoctaw§!.\nIn the north, wandering prophets and leaders advocate for unity among the §YIroquois§! and the §YHurons§!, forming powerful confederacy that will shape the course of history.
translation: 古密西西比文明的最后的残余也正在逐渐衰落，它们后来会形成§Y克里克§!，§Y奇克索§!和§Y乔克托§!。\n在北方，徘徊着部落的先知与首领，他们提倡§Y易洛魁§!与§Y休伦§!的统一联盟，形成了一个强大的联邦，注定将改变整个历史的进程。

original: In the wake of the collapse of the Wari and Tiwanaku empires, the Andean world has fractured into a number of regional kingdoms. In [GetYear], the young prince Yupanqui Pachacutec has just saved his ancestral kingdom from total extinction at the hands of the neighboring Chancas, and has instead annexed their kingdom. Few would guess at this point that this young prince would transform his small kingdom into the greatest empire in the history of the continent.
translation: 瓦里和蒂瓦纳科帝国衰败和崩溃后，安第斯世界分裂成几个区域性国家。在[GetYear]年，年轻的王子尤潘基·帕查库特克刚刚兼并了昌卡，从他们的手下拯救了由先王传承下来的王国。很少有人会猜到这个年轻的王子会把他的弹丸小国发展成这个大陆历史上最伟大的帝国。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! is one of the countries populating the New World, a region both vast and entirely uncharted. What the future holds for our people is both uncertain and up to our ambitions.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!是位于新大陆的国家之一，这是一个广阔而未知的区域。未来对于我们的人民是一片未知，而我们的雄心必将主宰。

original: Some would say that the [Root.GovernmentName] of §Y[Root.GetName]§! is a country with an insignificant past. While this is clearly more jealousy than truth, our past is not as important as the glorious future in store for our people.
translation: 一些人会说§Y[Root.GetName]§!的[Root.GovernmentName]过去只是一个微不足道的小国。虽然这明显是出于嫉妒，但比起我们人民所拥有的光明未来，我们的过去并不重要。

original: [Root.GetName] is [Root.Religion.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]信仰[Root.Religion.GetName]

original: The [Root.GetName] are [Root.Religion.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]信仰[Root.Religion.GetName]

original:
The 16th century is a time of great changes in the political fabric of the world. The rebellion against the §YCatholic§! Church itself, by a number of §YReformers§! and their adherents, will in time have a profound impact on the political life on Europe. More immediately, however, dynamic statesmen are reshaping the world to their liking.

In Western Europe, §YFrance§!, §YSpain§! and §YAustria§! are in constant conflict over §YItaly§! and the §YLow Countries§!. Spain is especially eager for European endeavors, bolstered by the sudden fall of the §YAztec§! and §YInca§! Empire, and the massive influx of wealth this brought them.

The Kalmar Union, once the defining alliance of Northern Europe, has been broken apart by §YSwedish§! noblemen, eager to build an empire of their own, rather than to serve in one ruled from Copenhagen.

In the Near East, the §YOttomans§! are about to embark on more large scale expansion than ever before in their history. §YPersia§!, recently united by the §YSafavid§! dynasty, is expanding in the opposite direction, headed for a direct confrontation.

In Kabul, the last §YTimurid§! prince, Babur, is gathering his forces for one final attempt to salvage an Empire for his dynasty. Destined to be successful beyond his wildest dreams, he is about to found an Empire to rule one fourth of the world's population.

For the most part however, the world of [GetYear] remains one of mostly isolated regions. All this is about to change, and not only due to the Spanish Imperial project in the Americas.
§YPortugal§! is steadily expanding their influence in the Indian Ocean, Indonesia and even East Asia. Soon, the squabbling states of Sengoku era §YJapan§! will be but a ship's journey from Lisbon, or even Havana.
translation:
16世纪是世界政治格局风云骤变的时代。由一群§Y宗教改革者§!与他们的支持者所领导的对抗§Y天主教§!教会的叛乱，将会在一段时间之后对欧洲的政治生活带来深远的影响。然而在短期内，活跃的政治家们正在按照自己的喜好重塑着世界。

在西欧，§Y法兰西§!，§Y西班牙§!和§Y奥地利§!在§Y意大利§!和§Y低地§!不断滋生冲突。§Y阿兹特克§!和§Y印加§!帝国的突然崩塌与大量财富的流入让西班牙渴望在欧洲大陆上更进一步。

曾经在北欧举足轻重的卡尔马联盟由于§Y瑞典§!贵族渴望建立自己的帝国而变得四分五裂，不再受哥本哈根的一并统治。

在近东，§Y奥斯曼§!帝国将要开启前所未有的更大规模的扩张。而最近才被§Y萨菲§!王朝统一的§Y波斯§!正在往相反的方向扩张，直面新的冲突。

在喀布尔，最后一位§Y帖木儿§!王子巴布尔，为了自家王朝的延续，正聚集力量做最后一搏，拯救帝国。然而他做梦也没有想到，自己命中注定将建立一个统治世界四分之一人口的帝国。

但对于大部分国家而言，[GetYear]的世界仍然是地区间彼此孤立的。然而这一切都将改变，不仅仅是因为西班牙的帝国力量辐射到了美洲。
§Y葡萄牙§!也正稳步在印度洋，印度尼西亚，甚至东亚提升自己的影响。很快，不断内斗的战国时代§Y日本§!将仅仅只是一趟从里斯本，甚至哈瓦那出发的航行的事了。

original:
Even years after the fact, few yet realize that the conflict that started by a window in Prague in 1618 will devastate the European continent for 30 years, and define the 17th century.

To the east the §YPolish-Lithuanian Commonwealth§! is losing ground to §YRussia§!, and the §YOttoman§! Empire has a firm hold over the Kingdom of §YHungary§!. While no border of the Empire is at peace, not in the Maghreb, Iraq, Egypt or the Balkans, the Sultanate has yet to reach its greatest extent.

§YSpain§! seemingly reigns supreme, in the New World as well as in Christian Europe, but the Kingdom is about to be challenged in both regions.

Further East, Akbar the Great has just left a thriving and expansionist §YMughal§! Empire to his son Aurangzeb. In time it will come to encompass almost the entire Indian subcontinent.

In East Asia, the §YManchu§! Jurchens have united, posing a threat to a §YMing§! Empire destabilized by inner turmoil and natural disasters.
§YJapan§! looks to have entered a period of peace, as the §YTokugawa§! Shogunate consolidates its hold over the last independent minded Daimyo of the island.

This is an age of Empires and rapidly growing central power, an age of war and conquest.
translation:
尽管事情已经过去了几年，但很少有人能意识到由1618年布拉格的一扇窗户导致的冲突将蹂躏欧洲大陆30年，并且决定了17世纪的格局。

东边§Y波兰立陶宛联邦§!的国土正被§Y俄罗斯§!蚕食，同时§Y奥斯曼§!帝国已经牢牢的控制住了§Y匈牙利§!王国。尽管帝国在马格里布，伊拉克，埃及以及巴尔干的边疆都处于战火中，奥斯曼苏丹国的领土仍然没有达到巅峰。

§Y西班牙§!看起来无论在新大陆还是基督教欧洲，都占据着绝对优势，但即将同时在两地受到挑战。

在更遥远的东方，阿克巴大帝刚刚去世，将不断扩张、兴旺的§Y莫卧儿§!帝国交给了他的儿子奥朗则布。不久之后，帝国将把整个印度次大陆收入囊中。

在东亚，统一了女真的 §Y满洲§!威胁着遭受内部动荡与自然灾害，更加混乱的§Y明§!帝国。
§Y日本§!在§Y德川§!幕府消灭了列岛上最后一个独立的大名之后，巩固了统治，进入了一段看似和平的时期。

这是一个帝国加速中央集权的时代，一个战争与征服的时代。

original:
At the dawn of the §YAge of Revolutions§! the great colonial Empires look as stable as ever. However, the seeds of destruction are planted, and the peoples of the Americas have begun to yearn for independence.

The §YQing§! Empire, born last century, has strengthened its hold over East Asia, expanding the borders of China even further than Ming influence ever reached.

In India, the §YMughal§! Empire has reached its widest extent, but in order to do so Aurangzeb has seriously overextended its resources, while giving influential administrators a greater deal of autonomy than the Imperial system can easily handle.

In Europe, the era of Absolutism has left the continent dominated by strong, hungry, and militaristic states.
Within a century, some of these kingdoms will spend great resources tearing each other apart, with the weaker ones, such as §YSweden§! or §YPoland§!, left by the wayside.

However, a much greater threat will in time reveal itself from within. As the hurdled masses embrace the revolutionary ideals, no monarch, however, enlightened, will be safe.
translation:
在§Y大革命时代§!的黎明时分，庞大的殖民帝国们貌似与以往一样稳定。然而，破坏的种子已经种下，美洲的人民逐渐开始呼唤独立与自由。

上一个世纪刚刚诞生的§Y清§!帝国进一步巩固了对于东亚的统治，并向外推进了中国的边境，超过了明朝所能影响的范围。

在印度，§Y莫卧儿§!帝国已经达到了它最大的疆域，但为此奥朗则布严重消耗了帝国国力，给予权势巨大的执政者们大量超出帝国所能控制的自治权。

在欧洲，专制主义时代留下了几个强大，饥渴，穷兵黩武的国家统治着整个大陆。
在接下来的一个世纪内，这些国家中的一部分将会消耗大量国力试图撕碎彼此，而剩下一部分相对较弱的国家，例如§Y瑞典§!或§Y波兰§!，将被淘汰出局。

然而更大的威胁即将在内部滋生，随着人民群众接受革命思想，无论多开明的君主都将无法明哲保身。

original:
£DLC_tr Patriarch Authority can also be increased by §YConsecrating Metropolitans§! in your states.

£DLC_tr Orthodox countries can use Patriarch Authority to commission religious §YIcons§! that give bonuses for 20 years.
translation:
£DLC_tr 牧首权威还能通过在你的直属州§Y祝圣都主教§!提升。

£DLC_tr 东正教国家能使用牧首权威敬拜§Y圣像§!，每次提供20年的奖励。

original: £DLC_ed Once colonization of the New World starts, the Papacy will bestow §YColonial Regions§! upon favored countries, with penalties for other Catholics that trespass.
translation: £DLC_ed£一旦开始殖民新大陆，教宗会把§Y殖民特许地区§!授予青睐的国家，违反的天主教国家会受到惩罚。

original: £DLC_cs Protestant countries accumulate §YChurch Power§! over time. This can be used to activate up to 3 §YAspects of Faith§!, tailoring their §YState Church§! to their own needs.
translation: £DLC_cs£新教国家会随时间积累§Y教会力量§!。教会力量可以用来激活最多3个§Y宗教信条§!，按需定制它们自己的§Y国家教会§!。

original: £DLC_won Reformed countries accumulate §YFervor§! monthly. Fervor can be used to activate foci on §YWar§!, §YTrade§! or §YStability§! for the Reformed Country.
translation: £DLC_won£改革宗国家每月积累§Y宗教热情§!。改革宗国家可以使用宗教热情激活§Y战争§!、§Y贸易§!或§Y稳定§!焦点。

original: £DLC_rom Coptic countries can activate §YBlessings§! through conquering the §YHoly Sites§! of their faith. The number of sites under Coptic control determine the number of Blessings for all Coptic countries in the world.
translation: £DLC_rom 科普特正教国家可以通过征服其信仰的§Y圣地§!来激活§Y神赐§!。在科普特正教控制之下的圣地数量将决定世界上所有科普特正教国家的神赐数量。

original: £DLC_cs §YBuddhist§! countries have a §YKarma§! value, that will confer different bonuses when it is high, low, or balanced. Karma can be increased by event choices, honoring military alliances, returning cores, converting provinces, being declared war upon, or releasing nations. Karma can be decreased through event choices, declaring wars, and conquering land.
translation: £DLC_cs §Y佛教§!国家拥有§Y业力§!值，在高、低水平和平衡状态下带来不同的奖励。业力可以通过事件的选择、响应盟友召唤、归还核心、转变省份信仰、被宣战或者释放国家等方式增加。业力同时也可以通过事件的选择、宣战、征服领土等方式降低。

original:
£DLC_moh Confucian countries accumulate §YHarmony§!, which gives penalties if it is too low and bonuses if it is high.

Confucian countries can also §YHarmonize§! their faith with other faiths, removing all penalties for adherent provinces. Harmonizing takes 50 years and consumes 3 Harmony per year.
translation:
£DLC_moh£儒教国家积累§Y和谐度§!。低和谐度会带来惩罚而高和谐度会带来加成。

儒教国家还能够§Y融合§!其他宗教，移除信仰该宗教省份的惩罚。融合持续50年并且每年消耗3和谐度。

original: £DLC_moh All Shinto countries have a level of §YIsolationism§!, ranging from §YOpen Doors§! to §YClosed Doors§!. All levels of Isolationism will confer different bonuses, and your level of Isolationism is changed through the options you take in countrywide §YIncidents§! that you will encounter as your country progresses through the ages.
translation: £DLC_moh£所有神道教国家拥有§Y孤立主义§!等级，范围在§Y门户开放§!到§Y闭关锁国§!之间。每个等级的孤立主义倾向会带来不同的奖励。 随着时间的推进，你在遇到的全国性§Y事变§!中所做的选择会改变你的孤立主义等级。

original: £DLC_won Hinduism is a polytheistic religion, and Hindu rulers can choose a §YPersonal Deity§!. This Deity will then confer different bonuses upon the entire country.
translation: £DLC_won 印度教是一个多神教 。印度教统治者可以选择一个§Y个人神祇§!。不同神祇会给整个国家带来不同加成。

original: \n\n£DLC_rom Fetishist rulers can select a §YCult§!, with its own bonuses and events. New Cults can be unlocked through interacting with countries of foreign religions, or other Fetishist countries that have adopted cults that you lack.
translation: \n\n£DLC_rom£拜物教统治者能够选择一个§Y崇拜§!，带来独有的奖励与事件。新的崇拜能通过与信仰其他宗教的国家或者选择其他崇拜的拜物教国家互动解锁。

original: £DLC_cos Tengri countries can adopt a second §YSyncretic§! faith. This faith will be treated as your own for most purposes, and its provinces will give you no penalties. The Syncretic Faiths also all give their own countrywide bonuses and events. Tengri countries that do not adopt a Syncretic Faith instead enjoy an alternative bonus and will have access to other decisions and events.
translation: £DLC_cos 长生天国家能够选择一个§Y相融§!信仰。相融信仰在大多数情况下会被视作你自己的宗教，信仰该宗教的省份将不会有惩罚。 相融信仰同时会给整个国家带来独特的加成与事件。没有选择相融信仰的长生天国家有另外的加成，并且拥有其他决议与事件。

original:
£DLC_ed Inti countries have a §YReligious Authority§! value. This goes up from choices in events, reducing local §Yautonomy§!, and expanding your empire. Inti Authority is reduced as your provinces gain more autonomy.

You will gain bonuses based on your level of Authority, and you can also use it to enact §YReligious Reforms§!. Every Reform will give a new permanent bonus, and result in a large scale revolt against your rule.

Once all Reforms are undertaken and you border a country with the §YFeudalism§! Institution, you can §YReform the Religion§! and gain technology and institutions from your neighbor, while retaining all the bonuses from Reforms undertaken.
translation:
£DLC_ed£因蒂国家拥有§Y宗教权威§!值。宗教权威通过事件，减少地方§Y自治§!与帝国扩张来增长。省份获得更多的自治度则会减少因蒂的宗教权威。

根据宗教权威级别你会获得不同奖励，同时你可以使用宗教权威实施§Y宗教改革§!。每一次改革都将带来一个永久奖励，但也会导致反抗你的统治的大规模叛乱。

一旦完成所有的改革，并且与拥有§Y封建制度§!思潮的国家接壤，你可以§Y完成教改§!并且获得邻国所有科技与思潮，同时保留所有宗教改革的奖励。

original:
£DLC_ed As a Nahuatl country you can always declare war during a §YRegency§!.
Nahuatl countries have a §YDoom§! value, that ticks up by one per province and year. Once the Doom counter reaches 100 it heralds our §YDoomsday§! which will result in all subjects breaking free and be the end of your ruler and the ruling dynasty.
In order to avert Doomsday, Nahuatl countries can declare §YFlower Wars§!, with the goal to capture people to sacrifice.
Nahuatl states can also §YSacrifice§! the §YRulers§! and §YHeirs§! of Subject states to placate the gods and slow down the count down to Doomsday.

Once a Nahuatl country has acquired §Y5 Vassal States§! it can enact a §YReligious Reform§!, gaining a permanent bonus, in exchange for all vassals declaring independence.
Once all Reforms have been undertaken, Nahuatl states can §YReform their Religion§!, gaining §YTechnology§! and §YInstitutions§! from a more advanced country they border. This will permanently disable the threat of Doom, while retaining the bonuses from all of the Religious Reforms.
translation:
£DLC_ed 作为信仰纳瓦特尔神话的国家，你可以在§Y摄政统治§!时期宣战。
纳瓦特尔国家拥有§Y末日§!值，每年每个省份会带来 1 点末日值。末日值达到 100 预示着§Y末日来临§!，导致所有附庸独立，以及统治者与其王朝终结。
为了避免末日来临，纳瓦特尔国家可以通过§Y荣冠战争§!来抓捕俘虏进行献祭。
纳瓦特尔国家还可以§Y献祭§!附庸国的§Y统治者§! 与§Y继承人§!来取悦众神，延缓末日的到来。

一旦获得§Y 5 个附庸国§!，纳瓦特尔国家可以实施一项§Y宗教改革§!，获得永久加成，但要付出所有附庸独立的代价。
一旦所有改革项都被实施，纳瓦特尔国家可以§Y改革他们的宗教§!，同时获得更先进的接壤邻国的§Y科技§!和§Y思潮§!。这样可以永久避免末日的威胁，同时保留所有宗教改革的奖励。

original:
£DLC_ed Countries of the Mayan faith can enact §YReligious Reforms§! once they reach 20 provinces in size. This will give a powerful permanent bonus, but also release many of the provinces under their control again.
Once all reforms are undertaken, countries of the Mayan faith can §YReform the Religion§! itself and gain §YTechnology§! and §YInstitutions§! from a more advanced neighboring state, while retaining the bonuses from Reforms undertaken.
translation:
£DLC_ed£玛雅宗教国家领土达到20个省份时能实施§Y宗教改革§!。改革会带来强力的永久奖励，但同时也会释放大部分原先控制的省份。
一旦完成所有改革，玛雅宗教国家可以§Y完成教改§!，获得更先进的邻国的§Y科技§!和§Y思潮§!，同时保留所有宗教改革的奖励。
